comments.text:
Created attachment 565098
wip

This refactoring is in preparation for the changes required for the home tab, but it should make the window startup code path cleaner, and remove the need to make hacky defaultArgs checks in other parts of the browser.
comments.author: margaret.leibovic@gmail.com
comments.creator: margaret.leibovic@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: This refactoring is in preparation for the changes required for the home tab, but it should make the window startup code path cleaner, and remove the need to make hacky defaultArgs checks in other parts of the browser.

This was green on try, except for jetpack tests (which I need to investigate). I want to know if there are any potential pitfalls I may be missing before I finish cleaning this up into a reviewable patch.
